xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: Acknowledgements This research was funded by Grant from Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology, Indonesia under WCR scheme. The authors do thank Sitti Rahmah for assistance in improving the figures.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Mathematics, Hasanuddin University, Makassar, 90245, Indonesia

head.citation-title: Alpha-Rooting Color Image Enhancement Method for Discrete Fourier Transform and Discrete Quaternion Fourier Transform
head.abstracts: © 2022, The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.In this paper, color images enhancement using alpha-rooting will be compared with the discrete Fourier transform and discrete quaternion Fourier transform. The increase in color images was measured by Gray Level Co-Occurrence Matrix (GLCM) by looking at the contrast in each image. It was found that the selection of α values greatly affect the results of image in an image. The results of experiments conducted using several images inform that the discrete Fourier transform has a GLCM value at a higher contrast than the discrete quaternion Fourier transform.
